alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Jones; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 8:05AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monroe, southeastern Butts, northwestern Jones and southwestern Jasper Counties through 845 AM EDT... At 805 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Blount, or near Forsyth, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forsyth, Blount, Hillsboro, McElheneys Crossroads, Berner, Juliette and Adgateville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EDT for central Georgia. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for central Georgia.
